title: Did Jeff say at his sessions: " If we sow fear and pain on children, adults will not want to come here? '
subtitle: It appears that a large-scale quote of the Attorney-General stems from a viral video shared by S. Jeff Merkelly, who visited a detention centre.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Attorney General Jeff said, "If we cause fear and pain to children, adults will not want to come here."
